abstract: JPMorgan Chase executive Timothy Ryan has withdrawn from consideration to become the U.S. Treasury Department’s top international official, the White House said on Thursday. “He withdrew himself from this opportunity for personal reasons,” White House spokesman Tony Fratto told Reuters.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase executive Timothy Ryan has withdrawn from consideration to become the U.S. Treasury Department’s top international official, the White House said on Thursday. “He withdrew himself from this opportunity for personal reasons,” White House spokesman Tony Fratto told Reuters.

headline.main: J.P. Morgan Official Withdraws from Treasury Nomination
